name: Dave is Late for Work
description:
A game made for the AD Gamejam 2021, made in roughly 4-5 days.
The game revolves around Dave, who may seem like a normal guy to everyone, except... he can manipulate SPACETIME! 
Dave uses his spacetime powers whenever he is in trouble (or just bored), forgot to buy milk yesterday? no problem use SPACETIME! , a boring work meeting? use SPACETIME!

CONTROLS
WASD - Movement
Left Shift - Run
Spacebar - Jump
LMB - Attack
E - Interact

CREDITS
Stefan Nikolich
